Have you factored in the specialized tools and materials needed?

educational.title: Why Your Windows Fog Up Between the Panes
educational.hook: If you see fog INSIDE your double-pane windows, your seal is broken and it's costing you money
educational.body: That moisture between the glass means the argon gas has escaped and your insulation value dropped by 50%. Here's what's happening: the seal around your insulated glass unit failed, usually after 15-20 years. Now outside air and moisture get in. Your energy bills go up, and it'll only get worse. The fix? IGU replacement - we swap just the glass unit, not the whole window. Takes 2 hours, costs 60% less than full replacement, and restores your R-value immediately.
educational.cta: Link in bio for a free seal failure assessment - we'll show you exactly what's leaking

educational.title: The Right Glass for Every Room
educational.hook: Using regular glass in your bathroom? That's a safety violation waiting to happen
educational.body: Building codes require tempered glass within 18 inches of doors and in wet areas for a reason - regular glass shatters into daggers, tempered breaks into pebbles. But there's more: Low-E glass blocks 70% of heat in south-facing rooms. Laminated glass cuts noise by 60% for street-facing windows. Obscure glass gives privacy without blocking light in bathrooms. And impact glass? Required in hurricane zones, but smart everywhere for security. Each room needs specific glass performance.
educational.cta: Drop 'GLASS GUIDE' below and we'll send you our room-by-room glass selection chart

educational.title: What That Crack Really Means
educational.hook: Not all glass cracks are emergencies, but three types need immediate attention
educational.body: Stress cracks from temperature - usually safe for a few weeks. Impact cracks - get these boarded within 24 hours for security. But spider cracks that spread? That's tempered glass about to explode into a thousand pieces. Here's the test: if the crack is growing, if it's near an edge, or if you can feel air coming through - that's urgent. We offer same-day emergency boarding and 48-hour glass replacement. Don't wait until it fails completely, especially on upper floors or in commercial storefronts.
